query: SELECT id, name, description, price, duration, trafficLimit, isActive FROM plans ORDER BY sortOrder;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2niMBJFQbqWKXSJ.root --database ik4QKwpUJXHkdpgpXC9yL3 --execute SELECT id, name, description, price, duration, trafficLimit, isActive FROM plans ORDER BY sortOrder;

rows.name: 免费版
rows.description: 体验版本，每台设备仅一次
